Suicide Watch Observation Log
Name of Inmate on watch: Epstein Reg #: 76318-054 Date: 7/24/19
Time Observations: Briefly note your observations. Initial all entries. Initials
0630am Im Epstein appears to be sleeping at this time, breakfast has arrived but has not been given to him as of yet (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
0645am Im Epstein appears to be sleeping (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
0700am I/c end of tour (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
7:00AM start the new sheet (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
D/w Rds Ops (IT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
7:15 AM Im Epstein recieve his breakfast and went back to Sleep and ask the L/T for his Madication (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
7:30 AM Im Epstein appears tobe Sleeping
7:35AM Im Epstein got up and he es hearing (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
7:40 AM Im Epstein ask for a Shower and I Cell the Lt (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
7:45AM Im Epstein steel eating his breakfast
8:00 AM Im Epstein is setting Slown on his bed (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
8:15AM Im Epstein working the bathroom
8:20Am I reviewed the log Book and (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
8:30 AM interviewed Im Epstein for psychology still interviewing Im Epstein (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
8:45 AM stepped Im Epstein down from Suicide watch to Psychological Observation (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Note to all observers: Legibly print and sign your name at the beginning of your shift.
7
DOJ-OGR-00025412
